amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to installing watchdogs at Federal agencies with extended Inspector General vacancies and strengthening and reforming Offices of Inspectors General to ensure that such Offices are appropriately prioritizing the investigation of waste, fraud, abuse, and misconduct within Federal agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 348 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 348 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Boozman. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2015) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to installing watchdogs at Federal agencies with extended Inspector General vacancies and strengthening and reforming Offices of Inspectors General to ensure that such Offices are appropriately prioritizing the investigation of waste, fraud, abuse, and misconduct within Federal agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 348 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 348 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Boozman.
